description: The Agave schidigera, aka the Century Plant, is a sight to behold. It's blue-gray stems, its rosette of spiky, grass-like leaves, and its thick, wooden trunk with spikes make it a striking plant. Not to mention, what makes it truly amazing is that it can live up to a century before it produces a single flower, blossoming only once at the end of its life before it dies. It's a truly unique and resilient plant that is unparalleled in its ability to thrive in harsh and unforgiving environments.
